using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace jaytwo.TimeZones
{
    internal static class TimeZoneRepositoryInternal
    {
        public static IEnumerable<CountryListItem> GetAllCountries()
        {
            {% for item in countries %}
            yield return new CountryListItem()
            {
                CountryIsoCode = "{{ item.CountryIsoCode }}",
                CountryName = "{{ item.CountryName }}",
            };
            {% endfor %}
        }

        public static IEnumerable<TimeZoneListItem> GetAllTimeZones()
        {
            {% for item in timeZones %}
            yield return new TimeZoneListItem()
            {
                Id = "{{ item.Id }}",
                CountryIsoCode = "{{ item.CountryIsoCode }}",
                CountryName = "{{ item.CountryName }}",
                IsCountryIndependent = {{ item.IsCountryIndependent }},
                OlsonTimeZone = "{{ item.OlsonTimeZone }}",
                DisplayName = "{{ item.DisplayName }}",
                DisplayNameWithCountry = "{{ item.DisplayNameWithCountry }}",                
                StandardOffset = "{{ item.StandardOffset }}",
                DisplayNameWithOffset = "{{ item.DisplayNameWithOffset }}",                
            };
            {% endfor %}
        }
    }
}
